programme.title: George Clarkes Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: George meets a Manchester couple who decided to spend their £10,000 nest egg on creating an underground casino in a hidden basement in their new home. George also meets a woman whos tired of the 9-5 drudgery, but cant afford to open a shop.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Childhood sweethearts and keen travellers Colin and Alison Jenkins fell in love with Barbados when they first visited 13 years ago. Now they want the island to be part of their early retirement plans.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Cardiff, 41-year-old dog mad shop manager Nicola Steele is serving prawn cocktail and a meat-free lasagne. She also has some doggy surprises and unusual entertainment up her sleeve.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Second to host in Cardiff is king of the name droppers Jerry Lockett, who hosts his night at his cousins mansion, following a flood at his home, serving dollops of food as well as a huge side order of celebrity.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: No-nonsense army wife Rachael Smith is third to host in Cardiff. Rachael is extremely competitive and isnt used to losing. She fully intends to win the prize and things might get ugly if she doesnt.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Flamboyant costume designer Sam Clarke plans a Mexican menu on his night in Cardiff; and it turns out to be prophetic choice for an evening that is full of sizzle and spice. Two of the guests fight at the table.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Ying and Jean host the weeks final visit, at Castle Inn in Powys. But theyve got a big task on their hands to ensure a peaceful visit for their guests, with tensions among the BandBers already bubbling away before anyones even checked in.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Jasmine Harman helps Keith and Heidi find their dream holiday home in southern Alicante in Spain, with enough space for their four children, six grandchildren and two dogs to visit. She lines up five great properties for their budget of £170,000.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: This episode follows Winston Churchill from a young soldier in India during the time of Queen Victoria, through the First World War, to victory in World War II, and finally to his retirement in the Swinging Sixties. Meanwhile across the world, meet the American soldier literally spreading propaganda around the battlefields, and learn about Gandhis more eccentric side.

programme.title: The Catch-Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news.

programme.title: The Weakest Link
programme.desc: Romesh Ranganathan takes charge of the back-stabbing big money game show. The contestants must create a chain of answers to avoid the boot.

programme.title: Alan Carrs Picture Slam
programme.desc: Playing this time are friends Lou and Jude from Grimsby, cousins Sibtain and Umar from London and Nottingham, and friends Steph and Jo from Barry. They are facing off across three rounds against the clock to make it to the final Super Slam and a chance to win £10,000. Do they know their cheddar cheese from their Cheddar Gorge? Find out in this hugely addictive show that will have the whole family shouting their answers at the telly.

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: RuPauls search for the UKs Next Drag Race Superstar continues in epic style. For their first challenge, the queens channel the spirit of Claudia Winkleman as they play their very own version of The Traitors.

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Guy and Jamma visit Guys family home to pick up his childhood diary for writing inspiration. When Jamma meets Guys mother and brother, he makes a perfect first impression, much to Guys despair. But all hell breaks loose when an unwelcome guest makes a frightening and confronting appearance.

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Its Guys book launch, but the venue has been double-booked with a wedding. When the bride goes missing, its Jammas time to shine - he goes to look for her to save both the launch and the wedding. Meanwhile, its still awkward between Winnie and Isaac after their near kiss. And Farida uses the launch as her chance to get Saif to sign the divorce papers.

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir Dhondy retraces Sarms last known movements before her disappearance from a charter yacht in 2021. She hears Sarms boyfriend, Ryan Bane, give his account of what happened through his lawyer.

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir meets with island police and is given CCTV footage that has never been released, showing Sarms last known movements with her boyfriend, Ryan Bane.

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir searches for the yacht Sarm vanished from and tracks down Ryan Banes ex-wife, hearing first-hand about her experiences while married to him.

programme.desc: A look at the hidden world of girls in gangs and the extent to which teenage girls are being criminally and sexually exploited.

programme.desc: Featuring Charlie Cooper, writer and star of the BBCs `This Country, who has a fascination for the weird and wonderful world of British folklore.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: The presenters take the prospective buyers around to different houses in the country. The desire for more room, cleaner air and less noise drives city dwellers to seek an escape to the country.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Have an animal-loving couple done enough research at a plot of land in Leicestershire? Quirky properties in North Yorkshire and Norfolk also go under the hammer with intriguing results!

programme.title: Gardeners World
programme.desc: Monty has plans for interest and colour in his garden next year, from adding a rose to the new Dog House to planting daffodil bulbs and sowing sweet pea seeds.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: Politics Live
programme.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: Bridge of Lies
programme.desc: Ross Kemp presents as team of four friends, Ben, Theo, Tobias and Niamh, take on the Bridge of Lies. One by one they all face the bridge, choosing who faces each crossing depending on the question category.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Today, Andy, Stuart, Alice and Charlotte battle it out to see which one of them is unbeatable.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The three talented chefs from Northern Ireland are halfway through their heat, and the pressure is mounting. Once again, they each serve a unique take on the brief celebrating the Olympic and Paralympic Games.

programme.title: Mountain Gorilla
programme.desc: The first episode of a three-part series on the worlds last mountain gorillas. The largest gorilla family in the world is starting the perilous journey down to feed on the fresh shoots of bamboo. They run the risk of being caught in illegal snares and the dominant silverback will have his work cut out keeping them all safe. In Uganda, Marembo the teenage silverback has come of age and feels it is time to go it alone.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Paul Martin is at Glemham Hall in the Suffolk countryside. Antiques experts James Lewis and David Fletcher find a selection of antiques, and Paul visits a Cold War airbase to find out what life was like for American airmen based in the UK.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Melanie Bracewell, Ruth Madeley, Jenny Powell and Mark Steel test their general knowledge skills on this weeks House of Games.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Backstage gossip from the world of Strictly Come Dancing as more couples stop by with some exclusives about their upcoming performances. And Strictlys costume designer, Vicky Gill, has a sneak peek at some of the weekends outfits.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Robert Daws and Mark Curry compete to be the award-winning antique. Robert, star of `Poldark and `The Royal, thinks his experience of costume dramas will give him an upper hand over former `Blue Peter presenter and West End star Mark.

programme.title: Saving Lives at Sea
programme.desc: The Blackpool crew receive reports of a man struggling in the water at midnight. Its vital to get him urgent medical attention.

programme.title: Lucy Worsley Investigates
programme.desc: Lucy Worsley investigates how the trial of one `witch sparked Britains witch-hunt craze. She begins her investigation in North Berwick, a seaside town not far from Edinburgh, where the witch hunting craze began. The story goes that in 1590, a coven of witches gathered here to cast a spell to try to kill the King of Scotland, James VI.

programme.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
programme.desc: Paul and Bob are on the River Severn in Worcestershire to fish for zander. Its a new species for both of them, and they enlist the help of a local guide, Tim Maslen to find the best spots.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: Till
programme.desc: The true story of Mamie Till-Mobleys relentless pursuit of justice for her 14-year-old son, Emmett Till, who was brutally lynched in 1955 while visiting his cousins in Mississippi.

programme.title: The Newsreader
programme.desc: Dale leans on alcohol to get through his day. Helens ability to produce her show is questioned. As the Berlin Wall falls, the two must regain focus and make big decisions.

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island
programme.desc: Back in civilisation, the honeymooners are paid a surprise visit from Davina, who reveals they will all face one final flare-out. Will they choose to commit to each other in the real world, or will they leave their relationships behind on Honeymoon Island forever?

programme.title: King and Conqueror
programme.desc: Sacrifices have to be made when Harold strikes against a Viking invader, and William seeks a fleet. Edith fears for the future, while Matilda moves to secure hers.

Meanwhile, the ouch-mobile is opening its doors for more medical mysteries, and in accident and emergency, one patient has a sweet stuck up their nose, and another has an ear thats swelling fast.

programme.desc: Its breakfast time for the children in Tummy Tales and in Teletubbyland. The Teletubbies wake up and cant decide whether to have tubby custard or tubby toast, so they have both!

programme.title: The Baby Club
programme.desc: Nigel and Baby Bear welcome babies Amber, Amelia, Arthur, DJ, Zadie, Betsy, Indianna and their grown-ups to The Baby Club. Inside everyones bags are leaves which are explored through discovery, play, song and story. Grown-ups at home are encouraged to take part by hiding baby appropriate leaves inside a fabric bag or pillowcase for them to reveal and explore with their baby. The song `All the leaves are falling down features, as does a story involving Baby Bear.

programme.title: Maddie and Triggs
programme.desc: Maddie, an adventurous youngster who happens to be visually impaired, sets out with her best doggy friend Triggs to discover the music and adventure in the sounds of the world around them.

programme.title: Dylans Playtime Adventures
programme.desc: Dylan imagines hes a construction worker wants to build the tallest building ever. When the finished structure doesnt work out as planned, he needs to think outside the (cardboard) box.

programme.title: Kiri and Lou
programme.desc: Lou shows Kiri the tree he has planted, but she is jealous and steals one of his seeds.

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Ginger the Tricarrotops explores the world of the crunchiest era, going on adventures throughout the colourful Vegesaur Valley.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey goes to Mum for advice about pesky neighbours when her couch cushion playhouse is threatened by Bingos huge stable of animals.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: As Peggee and the Hummingbirds journey up the river to deliver a parcel, they have fun spotting and avoiding the wildlife that they meet along the way. All while Otti tries to avoid playing with the boat whistle!

programme.title: Hey Duggees Squirrel Club
programme.desc: Lots of sticky questions are answered at Squirrel Club, with a surprise guest appearance!

programme.title: Roots and Fruits
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its Potato dedicating a song to his uncle Spud, who went on a spaceship to the moon.

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Apricot has brought her favourite blanket to the nursery, but when she briefly puts it down the other animals mistake it for a rag which they use to clean up paint and mud.

programme.title: Time for School
programme.desc: Its Miss Gerrards birthday, and the children plan a surprise party for her. Felicity and Coen are the chefs. Theyre in charge of baking and decorating a delicious birthday cake, with help from Mrs Bailey. Theo and Jasper are making a beautiful birthday crown for Miss Gerrard to wear, and have asked Mrs Hussain to help them. With everything ready, its time for the surprise party!

programme.title: Big Cook Little Cook
programme.desc: Small is pretending to be a detective as something has eaten all the salad in the garden. Wiggly Woo the worm comes to visit, Small flies off on her spoon to find out how rhubarb is harvested, and the two chefs cook a delicious worm crumble for their wiggly guest.

programme.title: Go Wild
programme.sub-title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie: Owl Butterfly and Sunbittern
programme.desc: Aneeshwar and Lizzie head into the heat of the butterfly house to meet the owl butterfly. They discover that this giant butterfly gets its name from the distinct patterns on its wings, which look like an owls eye. Next, they visit the sunbittern.

programme.title: Whats in Your Bag?
programme.desc: Steve the palaeontologist tells us all about his fascinating dinosaur bone fossil that is 66 million years old!

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Tinks is a disability assistance dog for her owner, Charli, who has a condition that makes it painful for her to pick things up or to push and pull things. Tinks uses her superfetch skills to help Charli every day. The smallest of the Dog Squad gang, Tinks is a little Lhasa Apso with lots of big dog energy. Tinks and Charli are planting some seeds at the allotments.

programme.title: Maddies Do You Know?
programme.desc: Maddie is finding out about the weather. She discovers why we have clouds and rain and how the water cycle works. We learn there are lots of different types of clouds but the clouds that make rain are called nimbus clouds.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say `mango and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. Its all about mangoes today: theres an orange mango, a red and green mango, a sweet mango, a mushy mango and a juicy mango.

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: When Nine needs a helping hand, he turns into a talented trio of circus blocks, the Three Threes. Learn how to share the number nine into equal parts with the Numberblocks.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: O goes through the magnifying glass to where the grass is blue, the trees are square and nonsense words make friendly monsters who run off with magnifying glasses.

programme.title: Wonderblocks
programme.desc: How do you pick apples from the top of a tree? With a giant beanstalk!

programme.title: Colourblocks
programme.desc: Black and White arrive in Colourland. Learn about two colours that are very different from the other Colourblocks.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee is trying to organise the Squirrels in order of height, but they keep getting distracted and forgetting what they are supposed to be doing. Duggee decides its time for some training.

programme.title: Yukee
programme.desc: Yukee and TapTap try to track down the source of a strange chirping noise in the garden.

programme.title: Something Special
programme.desc: Bouncy fun as Justin and his friend join a basketball team for the day and learn some new skills. Mr Tumble has a new ball of his own, but this ball is a little bit too bouncy.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dipsy, and Laa-Laa trot and gallop across Teletubbyland pretending to be horses. Children in Tummy Tales help to groom and feed a horse.

programme.title: Andys Prehistoric Adventures
programme.desc: Andy travels back in time three million years to the Great Rift Valley in Africa to meet one of our very own ancient ancestors, australopithecus. During his adventure he has a narrow escape from an angry relative of the elephant.

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
programme.desc: The Brooklyn-Bells take Waffle round to Mrs Hobbs house to show her what a good dog hes become. Shes very impressed until she discovers Waffle has gone missing.

programme.title: Topsy and Tim
programme.desc: The twins camping trip doesnt quite go as planned when Topsy is rushed to hospital for an operation. Whilst Topsy is recuperating, Tim realises his eyesight is not as good as it should be, so Mummy arranges for him to have an eye test.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo is having a banana party. Raa Raa and the others have picked masses of lovely bananas, but how are they going to transport them back to Ooo Ooos in time for the party?

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.desc: The Cosmo-players arrive on a technological planet and learn the game What Animal Are You? But before they can play, they have to find Nina, who has mysteriously disappeared!

programme.title: Octonauts: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: The Octonauts expand their exploration beyond the sea - and onto land. With new rides and new friends, they are prepared to protect any habitats and animals at risk on land or under the water.

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: Cosima and Big Lizard are helping Dad train for his astronaut fitness test. When Rex gets into trouble, Dads hard work finally pays off.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of Supertato, the worlds first potato superhero as he tackles the mischievous Evil Pea, in the supermarket aisles.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Its a very hot day and Duggees flowers are looking very sad. They need some water but theres not a drop to be found. How can they make the rain come? What about the rain dance! Duggee teaches the squirrels the best rain dance ever and it really does work well.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of Nutkin on the Run
programme.desc: When Squirrel Nutkin angers Old Brown by taking his glasses, its up to Peter and his friends to put things right.

programme.title: Time for School

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: Preston needs rescuing from a stuck cable car. When the car suddenly starts moving again, Mojo has to ride the cable to chase it down and save poor Preston.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bingo and Dad must brave a swooping magpie protecting its nest when they go on a curry swap to Mackenzies house through the park.

programme.title: Bluey

programme.title: Dodges Pup School
programme.desc: When Biscuit gets peas stuck in her fur, Dodge mishears and thinks she has fleas.

programme.desc: Frasiers high school reunion is approaching and he is afraid to go because he believes that he is cursed. Every time the high school reunion comes round, it coincides with a severe downturn in his life.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Martin volunteers to move in with Niles, who agrees because Daphne would be moving in also.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: The bosses of Hamburger Marys go undercover and meet an employee who is so consumed with making money that respect for customers goes out the window.

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Channel 4s midday news summary.

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: Mike and Craig need to think outside the box to survive the winter at their Spanish bar. And Graham, Jake and Danielle are finally ready for guests at their French chateau.

programme.title: Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz travel to Jersey in the Channel Islands to take on a 1972 Ford Escort Mexico.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Colin Murray, Rachel Riley and Susie Dent host, with Mark Radcliffe in Dictionary Corner, as contestants race against the clock to pit their wits against vowels, consonants and numbers.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Engaged couple Sharon and Paul from Shropshire would love to own a holiday home in the seaside town of Gran Alacant on Spains southern Costa Blanca. Jean Johansson shows them what £135k can buy.

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: Can Tony and Lauren crack their Spanish villages mysterious past? In France, Claire and Jo demolish an old barn for future ventures. John and Tara leave no stone unturned.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: After the high drama of stray hairs in drawers and grumbles about not having somewhere convenient to put a towel, the week draws to a close with payment day.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Leeds, hair salon owner Sarah hosts an 80s night of disco dancing and retro grub. Will she be a cut above the rest?

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: What terracotta treats have the Hamiltons got in store for Nigel and Hazel in Málaga? And in Alicante, the Rodriguez sisters hope to make Marias dream of Spanish living come true.

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Includes sport and weather.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off: An Extra Slice
programme.desc: Lorraine Kelly and AJ Odudu dip into Chocolate Week with a fondue review. But whose chocolate tart was doomed from the start, and did anyone have a meltdown?

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Britains sharpest armchair critics share more of their sharp, insightful, passionate and sometimes emotional critiques of the weeks biggest and best shows on television.

programme.title: Mitchell and Webb Are Not Helping
programme.desc: The real cause of climate change? Its good news and bad news. Plus: TVs most wholesome heirloom repair show. A death in the Sweary Aussie family. And the lawyers intervene in the writers room.

programme.title: Sarah Millican: Bobby Dazzler
programme.desc: In Sarah Millicans stand-up special, youll learn about the best way to eat a kiwi fruit, how your vagina candle should smell, trying to lose weight but only losing the tip of your finger and a surprisingly funny smear test.

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: The film crew for a nature documentary on a legendary tribe of the area is hijacked by Sarone, a madman intent on capturing the biggest snake in the Amazon, but since reptiles dont grow to 40 feet without eating, whos hunting whom?

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay goes back to three restaurants - Handlebar, Casa Roma and The Black Pearl - to check in with the owners he helped in the past and find out whether his advice has been put to good use.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Northamptonshire, makeup artist Jules Osmany hopes that her Indian/ Moroccan fusion menu and laid-back attitude to life will win her the prize.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Second up in Northamptonshire is funeral service manager Peter Pickering, who is dead set on hosting a traditional dinner party reminiscent of the 1920s. However, his guests dont like the sound of his bread and butter pudding.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Stay-at-home mum Stephanie Reeders nerves are evident from the outset on her night in Northamptonshire. Shes planning to serve classic fish and chips while offering a glamorous swishing session for fun.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Tweny-six-year-old business planning manager Lauren Oxlade is the penultimate host in Northamptonshire. She is an organised and passionate cook and has a few surprising friends who shes invited along to her party.

programme.title: Anjaam
programme.desc: Vijay falls in love with Shivani, but when he decides to marry her, its revealed Shivani doesnt love him back.

programme.title: Roti
programme.desc: An escaped criminal finds shelter with the family of a man he accidentally killed.

programme.title: Dushmani
programme.desc: A young woman is parted from her lover and forced to marry an underworld don. She hopes her lover will save her, but when their families become rivals, he turns against her.

programme.title: Kunwara
programme.desc: A young mans budding romance with a woman he met in New Zealand is threatened by an unexpected complication.

programme.title: Ishq Vishk
programme.desc: It is about Rajiv and Payal who are friends since childhood. While Payal is in love with Rajiv, it takes him a bit longer to return her feelings.

programme.title: Blue
programme.desc: Watch the lies and deceit unfold as three men search for a sunken treasure.

programme.title: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
programme.desc: This is a true story of `the Flying Sikh - world champion runner and Olympian Milkha Singh who overcame the massacre of his family and the civil war during the India-Pakistan partition.

programme.title: 777 Charlie
programme.desc: A naughty and energetic pup named Charlie gives a lonely and reclusive man a new perspective toward his life.

programme.title: Gandhi
programme.desc: The celebrated blockbuster recounting the life of Mohandas K Gandhi, who started out as a lawyer and rose to become the leader of the Indian independence movement. Preaching a sophisticated and forceful version of pacifism, he helped to liberate his country from colonial rule and was a symbol of peace and compassion throughout the world.

programme.sub-title: The One With the Tea Leaves

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess wants a bathtub in the apartment, and Winston helps her get one. Schmidt is still interested in CeCe and thinks they would be great together, but he is also still with his boss. Nick meets a woman with man troubles.

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: When the gang attempts to juggle multiple holiday parties in one night, Jess tries to avoid a remorseful Sam, Nick tries to keep up with a sexually adventurous Angie and Winston panics when he gets a cranberry stuck in his ear.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Vanessa and Mike work on balancing their relationship, and Mandy goes vegan.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Mike learns Ed hired his daughter to replace him as Outdoor Mans marketing consultant. Elsewhere, Mike and Eve bring home a stray dog.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray is shocked when Debra takes all their baby clothes to a garage sale. He didnt know theyd decided not to have any more children, and their disagreement soon becomes a family affair when Marie starts dishing out unwanted advice.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray Barone balances his life as a sports writer, a father and a husband in a chaotic household, along with maintaining his relationships with his mother, father, and brother living next-door.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray is afraid that Debra is marrying him for the wrong reason.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray moves his family into his parents house when the termite exterminators visit, and Debra takes the opportunity to turn the tables by interfering in Frank and Maries life.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Mike is ecstatic when Eve is picked to be her high schools first female kicker, but Vanessa feels high school football could be risky for their youngest daughter.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: When Boyd gets sent home early from a birthday party for starting a game of `war, Ryan insists Mike stop exposing his son to action movies and video games.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rosss Inappropriate Song
programme.desc: When Chandlers former romantic rival intends to sell his apartment, insecure Chandler persuades Joey to help him secretly inspect it and the guys are shocked to discover an old videotape featuring Monica having sex with Richard.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels Other Sister
programme.desc: On the night before Thanksgiving, Rachels self-centred younger sister Amy ruins everyones holiday dinner with her uncensored observations. Meanwhile, Monica obsessively protects her good wedding china, and Joey forgets to join his television cast mates in the big Thanksgiving parade.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels Phone Number
programme.desc: Rachel impulsively gives a handsome restaurant patron her telephone number, and worries that hell call when Ross is in their apartment. Meanwhile, Phoebes boyfriend Mike and Ross desperately try to find something in common to talk about when they babysit Emma, and Chandler returns from Tulsa to visit Monica, but must hide from Joey after rejecting his offer of free basketball tickets.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Christmas in Tulsa
programme.desc: Chandler is forced to remain in Tulsa over the Christmas period due to a major deadline at work, and Monica fears the worst when she finds out that he will be joined in Tulsa by a beautiful colleague Wendy. While he works, Chandler recalls some of the more embarrassing moments from previous holidays shared with his friends.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Rachel Goes Back to Work
programme.desc: When Rachel returns to her office to show off baby Emma, she is surprised to find handsome temp Gavin has been doing her job while she has been away on maternity leave. Their immediate war of wills prompts Rachel to make a rash decision.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe and Mike parent baby rats born in her cabinet, Rachel gets steamed after Monica invites a rival to her birthday bash, and Joey likes Emmas new nanny.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: While Rachel tries to sort out her mixed feelings for her handsome colleague Gavin, Ross recruits Chandler to help him meet attractive women and make Rachel jealous. Meanwhile, Phoebe regrets bringing Monica to a karaoke night when she takes the microphone and delights in the applause, unaware that the men in the audience are cheering because they can see through her dress, and Joey submits to painful eyebrow waxing.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Blind Dates
programme.desc: Joey and Phoebe conspire to arrange awful dates for both Rachel and Ross, hoping that appreciation of their former relationship will push them back together. Meanwhile, the ovulating Monica wants to get intimate with Chandler.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey stumbles upon a way to impress a famous actor during an audition, Ross learns the identity of a long-ago mugger, and Chandler accepts an internship at a shoe company.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Boob Job
programme.desc: Monica secretly asks Joey for a loan because she and Chandler are strapped for cash, Phoebe invites her boyfriend to move in with her, and Rachels apartment baby-proofing drives Joey crazy.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Memorial Service
programme.desc: When Chandler jokingly posts an outrageous biography about Ross on Ross college alumni website, Ross retaliates in kind, sparking an internet war. Meanwhile, Monica gets extremely vigilant after a weak-willed Phoebe asks for help to stop her from contacting Mike after their relationship ends.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Hoping to win a huge jackpot, the friends pool their money and buy dozens of lottery tickets, but they argue over how to spend the fortune if they win, and Monica irritates everyone else by buying tickets just for her and Chandler. Exasperated, Phoebe takes the bowl of everyones tickets and threatens to throw it off the balcony. The others make up, but a pigeon startles Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: A visit to the set of a soap opera inspires Rachel to dream of a romantic encounter with Joey, and Chandler must take Ross on a weekend getaway after Monica is unable to take time off from work.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Soap Opera Party
programme.desc: Ross is excited when he meets a stunning palaeontology professor, but when he takes her to Joeys rooftop party for the actors soap-opera co-stars, she intimidates him with her impressive list of former boyfriends. Meanwhile, Rachel and an intoxicated Monica make fools of themselves at the party chasing after the hunky daytime actors.

programme.title: Big Trouble in Little China
programme.desc: Jack Burto agrees to pick up a friends girlfriend from the airport, but when Miao Yin is kidnapped in front of him, Burton finds shes been abducted by sorcerer Lo Pan, the host of the spirit of an ancient Chinese warlord. He wants her for her unique green eyes, rare among Chinese women, that will rejuvenate his spirit and Burton has just hours to track down his lair and free Yin.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rosss Inappropriate Song
programme.desc: When Chandlers former romantic rival intends to sell his apartment, insecure Chandler persuades Joey to help him secretly inspect it and the guys are shocked to discover an old videotape featuring Monica having sex with Richard.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels Other Sister
programme.desc: On the night before Thanksgiving, Rachels self-centred younger sister Amy ruins everyones holiday dinner with her uncensored observations. Meanwhile, Monica obsessively protects her good wedding china, and Joey forgets to join his television cast mates in the big Thanksgiving parade.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels Phone Number
programme.desc: Rachel impulsively gives a handsome restaurant patron her telephone number, and worries that hell call when Ross is in their apartment. Meanwhile, Phoebes boyfriend Mike and Ross desperately try to find something in common to talk about when they babysit Emma, and Chandler returns from Tulsa to visit Monica, but must hide from Joey after rejecting his offer of free basketball tickets.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Christmas in Tulsa
programme.desc: Chandler is forced to remain in Tulsa over the Christmas period due to a major deadline at work, and Monica fears the worst when she finds out that he will be joined in Tulsa by a beautiful colleague Wendy. While he works, Chandler recalls some of the more embarrassing moments from previous holidays shared with his friends.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Rachel Goes Back to Work
programme.desc: When Rachel returns to her office to show off baby Emma, she is surprised to find handsome temp Gavin has been doing her job while she has been away on maternity leave. Their immediate war of wills prompts Rachel to make a rash decision.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe and Mike parent baby rats born in her cabinet, Rachel gets steamed after Monica invites a rival to her birthday bash, and Joey likes Emmas new nanny.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: While Rachel tries to sort out her mixed feelings for her handsome colleague Gavin, Ross recruits Chandler to help him meet attractive women and make Rachel jealous. Meanwhile, Phoebe regrets bringing Monica to a karaoke night when she takes the microphone and delights in the applause, unaware that the men in the audience are cheering because they can see through her dress, and Joey submits to painful eyebrow waxing.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Blind Dates
programme.desc: Joey and Phoebe conspire to arrange awful dates for both Rachel and Ross, hoping that appreciation of their former relationship will push them back together. Meanwhile, the ovulating Monica wants to get intimate with Chandler.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey stumbles upon a way to impress a famous actor during an audition, Ross learns the identity of a long-ago mugger, and Chandler accepts an internship at a shoe company.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Boob Job
programme.desc: Monica secretly asks Joey for a loan because she and Chandler are strapped for cash, Phoebe invites her boyfriend to move in with her, and Rachels apartment baby-proofing drives Joey crazy.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Memorial Service
programme.desc: When Chandler jokingly posts an outrageous biography about Ross on Ross college alumni website, Ross retaliates in kind, sparking an internet war. Meanwhile, Monica gets extremely vigilant after a weak-willed Phoebe asks for help to stop her from contacting Mike after their relationship ends.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Hoping to win a huge jackpot, the friends pool their money and buy dozens of lottery tickets, but they argue over how to spend the fortune if they win, and Monica irritates everyone else by buying tickets just for her and Chandler. Exasperated, Phoebe takes the bowl of everyones tickets and threatens to throw it off the balcony. The others make up, but a pigeon startles Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: A visit to the set of a soap opera inspires Rachel to dream of a romantic encounter with Joey, and Chandler must take Ross on a weekend getaway after Monica is unable to take time off from work.

Meanwhile, Rachel and an intoxicated Monica make fools of themselves at the party chasing after the hunky daytime actors.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: Roland Deschain, the last Gunslinger, must prevent the Man in Black from toppling the Dark Tower, the key that holds the universe together.

programme.desc: After the triumph of the machines on Judgement Day and with killer robots hunting down the last vestiges of humanity, resistance fighter John Connor battles back. However, the arrival of a mysterious stranger threatens to tip the balance in favour of the machines.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother to protect their kingdom and save the world from destruction.

programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.desc: Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises to combat massive, malevolent foes that have been feeding on a nuclear plants reactors and now threaten mankind with total annihilation.

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
programme.desc: The brave mariner Sinbad battles raging elements, mutinous dogs and fearsome monsters to retrieve the Book of Peace after being framed by the treacherous Goddess of Chaos. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: A feature-length spin-off from the TV series, the Thornberry family - led by natural history film-maker Colonel Radcliff Thornberry - head to deepest Africa. Once there, daughter Eliza - after meeting a shaman - can talk to the animals, a skill that stands her in good stead to foil a dastardly plot by poachers to kill a herd of elephants for their ivory.

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Two rogues stumble across a map of the treasures of El Dorado and stow away on an explorers ship bound for South America, where they are mistaken for gods due to their foreign complexions. Narrated by Elton John, who provided the music to Tim Rices lyrics.

programme.title: Fireheart
programme.desc: In New York City in 1932, women are not allowed to be firefighters. When the citys firemen disappear in mysterious fires, Georgia Nolan sees a golden opportunity. She disguises herself as Joe and joins a team of improvised firemen.

programme.title: Dragon Rider
programme.desc: A dragon, an orphaned boy, and a mountain spirit work together as they trek through the Himalayas in search for the Rim of Heaven.

programme.title: Shark Tale
programme.desc: A fast-talking fish gains fame after taking credit for the accidental death of a shark mobster. While enjoying the popularity at first, his tall tale starts to unravel as others begin to suspect that he is not the Defender of the Reef after all, and when the sharks enemies get involved, his lies lead him into dangerous waters. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: The LEGO Movie 2: The Second Part
programme.desc: The citizens of Bricksburg face a dangerous new threat when LEGO DUPLO invaders from outer space start to wreck everything in their path. The battle to defeat the enemy and restore harmony to the LEGO universe takes Emmet, Lucy, Batman and the rest of their friends to faraway, unexplored worlds that test their courage and creativity.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A pig, a mouse, a porcupine, a gorilla, an elephant and other animals gather at a koalas theatre for a singing competition.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Flightless birds lead a mostly happy existence, except for Red, who just cant get past the daily annoyances of life. His temperament leads him to anger management class, where he meets fellow misfits Chuck and Bomb. Red becomes even more agitated when his feathered brethren welcome green pigs to their island paradise. As the swine begin to get under his skin, Red joins forces with Chuck and Bomb to investigate the real reason behind their mysterious arrival.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: Red, Chuck, Bomb and the rest of their feathered friends are surprised when a green pig suggests that they put aside their differences and unite to fight a common threat. Aggressive birds from an island covered in ice are planning to use an elaborate weapon to destroy the fowl and swine way of life. After picking their best and brightest, the birds and pigs come up with a scheme to infiltrate the island, deactivate the device and return to their respective paradises intact.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: Tintin and his dog Snowy buy a model of a three-masted sailing ship `The Unicorn at a market and are immediately accosted by two people who both want to buy the model from Tintin. Tintin takes the model ship home and is later shot at and then kidnapped on board a ship with Snowy. Will they escape in time, and solve the mystery of the secret of the Unicorn?

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: An opportunistic raccoon teaches fellow animals about the edible treasures that the new humans in the neighbourhood conveniently leave outdoors.

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: The story of a wild mustang stallion captured by horse traders and sold to a cavalry regiment at a frontier outpost, where a cruel colonel attempts to break the free-spirited horse. However, he escapes in the company of a Native American youth and embarks upon a series of adventures in the harsh and unforgiving times of the Old West.

The battle to defeat the enemy and restore harmony to the LEGO universe takes Emmet, Lucy, Batman and the rest of their friends to faraway, unexplored worlds that test their courage and creativity.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A pig, a mouse, a porcupine, a gorilla, an elephant and other animals gather at a koalas theatre for a singing competition.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Flightless birds lead a mostly happy existence, except for Red, who just cant get past the daily annoyances of life. His temperament leads him to anger management class, where he meets fellow misfits Chuck and Bomb. Red becomes even more agitated when his feathered brethren welcome green pigs to their island paradise. As the swine begin to get under his skin, Red joins forces with Chuck and Bomb to investigate the real reason behind their mysterious arrival.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: Red, Chuck, Bomb and the rest of their feathered friends are surprised when a green pig suggests that they put aside their differences and unite to fight a common threat. Aggressive birds from an island covered in ice are planning to use an elaborate weapon to destroy the fowl and swine way of life. After picking their best and brightest, the birds and pigs come up with a scheme to infiltrate the island, deactivate the device and return to their respective paradises intact.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: Tintin and his dog Snowy buy a model of a three-masted sailing ship `The Unicorn at a market and are immediately accosted by two people who both want to buy the model from Tintin. Tintin takes the model ship home and is later shot at and then kidnapped on board a ship with Snowy. Will they escape in time, and solve the mystery of the secret of the Unicorn?

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: An opportunistic raccoon teaches fellow animals about the edible treasures that the new humans in the neighbourhood conveniently leave outdoors.

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: The story of a wild mustang stallion captured by horse traders and sold to a cavalry regiment at a frontier outpost, where a cruel colonel attempts to break the free-spirited horse. However, he escapes in the company of a Native American youth and embarks upon a series of adventures in the harsh and unforgiving times of the Old West.

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
programme.desc: The brave mariner Sinbad battles raging elements, mutinous dogs and fearsome monsters to retrieve the Book of Peace after being framed by the treacherous Goddess of Chaos. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Two rogues stumble across a map of the treasures of El Dorado and stow away on an explorers ship bound for South America, where they are mistaken for gods due to their foreign complexions. Narrated by Elton John, who provided the music to Tim Rices lyrics.

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: In 1940, with a German invasion looming, the defence of Walmington-on-Sea is in the hands of local bank manager Captain Mainwaring and a motley collection of volunteers. After a series of blunders, the Home Guard finally get the glory they deserve.

programme.title: Heaven Can Wait
programme.desc: An American footballer is given the body of a wealthy industrialist after an inept angel prematurely claims his life.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Brewsters Millions
programme.desc: Montgomery Brewster is a low-league baseball player who suddenly finds out that a distant relative has left him $300 million. However, theres a catch: he has to waste $30 million in just 30 days without anyone knowing hes doing it.

programme.title: Blue Hawaii
programme.desc: After returning to his Hawaiian home, a soldier takes a job with a tourist bureau against the advice of his parents.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that the blonde bum is about to cause.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop from the original film returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unraveling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks. The investigation puts him on the trail of an illegal arms dealer and his hit lady.

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: Billy is the son of hotel chain magnate Brian Madison and expects to inherit the family fortune, but hes shocked when his father stipulates he wont unless he passes 12th grade in just 24 weeks. It will be tough, since he never passed 1st grade. Determined to prove his father wrong, Billy enrols at school.

programme.title: Yesterday
programme.desc: Jack Malik is a struggling singer-songwriter in an English seaside town whose dreams of fame are rapidly fading, despite the fierce devotion and support of his childhood best friend, Ellie. After a freak bus accident during a mysterious global blackout, Jack wakes up to discover that The Beatles have never existed. Performing songs by the greatest band in history to a world that has never heard them, Jack becomes on overnight sensation with a little help from his agent.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: Swede Caroline
programme.desc: As Caroline readies herself for the championship, the competitive giant vegetable-growing world is rocked by scandal. Her prized marrow plants are stolen, and her life turns upside down, so she hires two private detectives.

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: In 1940, with a German invasion looming, the defence of Walmington-on-Sea is in the hands of local bank manager Captain Mainwaring and a motley collection of volunteers. After a series of blunders, the Home Guard finally get the glory they deserve.

programme.title: Swede Caroline
programme.desc: As Caroline readies herself for the championship, the competitive giant vegetable-growing world is rocked by scandal. Her prized marrow plants are stolen, and her life turns upside down, so she hires two private detectives.

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: Midge Kelly steps into the ring to defend his world title and then tells his rise to fame through flashback. A drifter with his brother Connie, his only way out of the poverty of the Depression is to climb into the ring, under the guidance of trainer Tommy Haley. As he rises to the top, he tramples on everyone whos helped him, from Haley to his first wife Emma.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: Anatomy of a Murder
programme.desc: Frederick Manion, an army lieutenant, is arrested for the murder of bartender, Barney Quill. In defence, he claims that the victim had beaten and raped his wife. With such evidence somewhat lacking, Manions lawyer, Paul Biegler attempts to save his defendant from prosecution, setting his assistants in search of witnesses.

programme.title: Funny Face
programme.desc: A Madison Avenue photographer transforms a timid saleswoman into one of the fashion worlds most glamorous models. The Gershwin-scored film includes `How Long Has This Been Going On?, He Loves and She Loves, and `S Wonderful.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: A conflicted Navy pilot and veteran of the Second World War questions the role he is forced to play when he is called back into service for the Korean War.

programme.title: The Girl on the Train
programme.desc: A divorced train commuter passes the house she used to live in with her husband every day. To distract herself she creates a fictional perfect world for her former neighbours in her head. This is ruined when one of the neighbours goes missing.

programme.title: The Kings Speech
programme.desc: Afflicted with a stammer, Prince Albert, the Duke of York, dreads the speaking engagements that come with being the son of King George V.

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: When a DJs sardonic exhortation to a late-night caller to wipe out a bar full of yuppies is taken literally, his world falls apart. Years later, on the point of suicide, he is saved by a similar casualty, a former medievalist whose wife was a victim of the bar bloodbath, and offered a chance for redemption by the mans quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Anatomy of a Murder
programme.desc: Frederick Manion, an army lieutenant, is arrested for the murder of bartender, Barney Quill. In defence, he claims that the victim had beaten and raped his wife. With such evidence somewhat lacking, Manions lawyer, Paul Biegler attempts to save his defendant from prosecution, setting his assistants in search of witnesses.

programme.title: Anatomy of a Murder
programme.desc: Frederick Manion, an army lieutenant, is arrested for the murder of bartender, Barney Quill. In defence, he claims that the victim had beaten and raped his wife. With such evidence somewhat lacking, Manions lawyer, Paul Biegler attempts to save his defendant from prosecution, setting his assistants in search of witnesses.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: In a time before the pyramids, an evil king threatens to take over the world, so the leaders of the remaining tribes under threat call upon a desert warrior to help them defeat the wicked one and his brutal hordes. As the warrior battles against the evil around him, he is preparing for a final showdown that will decide if it is to be his destiny to become the great Scorpion King.

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Endearing film version of Lionel Barts successful stage musical based on Dickenss tale of the fluctuating fortunes of an orphan boy. Ron Moody stands out as the wily old scrounger Fagin in a series of well-crafted set-pieces and atmospheric musical numbers, and a tribe of child stars brings the 19th-century London underworld vividly to life.

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl, Queen Victoria and the Big Friendly Giant must devise a plan to get rid of Bloodbottler, Fleshlumpeater and all the other bad giants once and for all.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit 2
programme.desc: Despite his efforts, Peter cant seem to shake his reputation for mischief among the other rabbits. Once he adventures out of the garden Peter finds himself in a world where mischief is appreciated, but soon his family come to bring him home.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything theyve faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: A huntsman and a fellow warrior help an ice queen battle the evil sister who betrayed her.

programme.title: It Takes Two
programme.desc: When a foster child meets the daughter of a bazillionaire, they hatch a plan to solve the problems in their life, and switch identities.

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: A wisecracking parrot caged in a research lab tells his life story to a lonely janitor. Before coming to the science lab, he has passed through the hands of a succession of owners, from a petty criminal to a man who runs a parrot-dancing act. Touched by his colourful story, the janitor conspires to liberate the talking bird.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: Paulie

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A young kid teams up with the niece of young adult horror author R.L. Stine after the writers imaginary demons are set free on the town of Greendale, Maryland.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Look Whos Talking
programme.desc: Mollie is a pregnant woman whose partner has deserted her. When she goes into labour, friendly taxi driver James rushes her to hospital and the pair become firm friends. He slowly falls in love with her and her baby Mikey, but shes still looking for her perfect partner, not realising hes right under her nose. However we can hear Mikeys thoughts, and he wants James as his Dad.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Mildreds world is turned upside down when her estranged father, a washed-up magician, comes back to look after her and takes her camping to find the mythological Canterbury Panther.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sharkboy and Lavagirl
programme.desc: Dreamer Max, ridiculed by his classmates, conjures up his perfect dreamworld - the Planet Drool, but his dream is more powerful than even he suspects, and his favourite dream superheroes, Sharkboy and Lavagirl, materialise on Earth. They bring news that an alien intelligence is threatening his beloved Planet Drool. Is it true, as Sharkboy and Lavagirl say, that only Max can stop it?

programme.title: It Takes Two
programme.desc: When a foster child meets the daughter of a bazillionaire, they hatch a plan to solve the problems in their life, and switch identities.

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A young kid teams up with the niece of young adult horror author R.L. Stine after the writers imaginary demons are set free on the town of Greendale, Maryland.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything theyve faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Look Whos Talking
programme.desc: Mollie is a pregnant woman whose partner has deserted her. When she goes into labour, friendly taxi driver James rushes her to hospital and the pair become firm friends. He slowly falls in love with her and her baby Mikey, but shes still looking for her perfect partner, not realising hes right under her nose. However we can hear Mikeys thoughts, and he wants James as his Dad.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Mildreds world is turned upside down when her estranged father, a washed-up magician, comes back to look after her and takes her camping to find the mythological Canterbury Panther.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sharkboy and Lavagirl
programme.desc: Dreamer Max, ridiculed by his classmates, conjures up his perfect dreamworld - the Planet Drool, but his dream is more powerful than even he suspects, and his favourite dream superheroes, Sharkboy and Lavagirl, materialise on Earth. They bring news that an alien intelligence is threatening his beloved Planet Drool. Is it true, as Sharkboy and Lavagirl say, that only Max can stop it?

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: New York City cab driver Travis Bickle constantly reflects on the ugly corruption of life around him, and becomes increasingly disturbed over his own loneliness and alienation. In nearly every phase of his life, Bickle remains a complete outsider, failing to make emotional contact with anyone. Unable to sleep night after night, Travis haunts the local pornography emporiums to find diversion.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The violent story of a Mafia family fighting to establish supremacy in the American business world following World War II, where an assassination attempt leaves Vito Corleone too ill to run the family business, forcing his sons Michael and Sonny to lead the Corleones into a vendetta-filled war with other mob families.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: Vito struggles to make a living, legally or illegally, for his wife and family in 1910s Little Italy, while Michael Corleones 1950s business expansion and lust for power leads to paranoia and the destruction of his family.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part III
programme.desc: Ex-Don, Michael Corleone, tries to legitimise his familys interests while at the same time keeping his daughter out of the familys seamier dealings. His descent, which started in `The Godfather Part II, accelerates as the Vatican becomes involved and events from the past conspire to keep him involved in a world he is trying to forget.

programme.title: The Exorcist
programme.desc: A famous actress calls upon medical science for help when her daughter begins behaving strangely, but without any success. Then, as bizarre and horrific incidents involving the daughter increase, her mother turns in desperation to the Church, and to a priest who doubts his own faith.

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: A half-human, half-vampire superhero hunts down the brutal bloodsucking creature who infected his mother.

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: The Lamberts believe that they have defeated the spirits that haunted their family, but they soon discover that evil is not beaten so easily.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: The Rugrats Movie
programme.desc: Tommy and his plucky pals go on a forest adventure in his fathers latest invention, the Reptar Wagon.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: The story of British humanitarian Nicholas Winton, who helped save hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from the Nazis on the eve of World War II.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: Bridget Joness Diary
programme.desc: A neurotic thirty-something resolves to take control of her life once and for all. She drinks, smokes and eats too much, and, worst of all, she falls for the wrong kind of man - passing over Mr Right for Mr Right Now. From the novel by Helen Fielding.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Bridgets brand new relationship with Darcy has taken a plummet due to her jealousy of his workmate. Having previously left the publishing house she worked for to avoid her boss, Daniel, with whom she had an unsuccessful romance, she finds him along for the ride on her new job, which takes her to Thailand, and almost into his arms.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: Marvin is a Milwaukee realtor who receives a crimson envelope from a former partner-in-crime whom he left for dead. He now finds himself thrust back into a world of ruthless hit men and double-crosses that turn his open houses into deadly war zones.

programme.title: Juliet and Romeo
programme.desc: The greatest love story of all time, set as an original pop musical. Based on the real story that inspired William Shakespeares Romeo and Juliet.

programme.title: Panda Plan
programme.desc: An action movie star must protect baby pandas from a group of mercenaries.

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: When a perfect night with a perfect stranger ends suddenly the next morning, Charlotte searches for answers and meaning in her life. However, she soon uncovers a shocking secret that changes everything she knows about the man who captured her heart.

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: Attacked by an unseen animal, Blake and his family barricade themselves inside a farmhouse as the creature prowls the perimeter. As the night stretches on, however, he begins to behave strangely, transforming into something unrecognizable.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman discovers the horrifying truth about the outside world while living in an underground shelter with two men.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Friendships Death
programme.desc: A British reporter meets female robot Friendship, who has been sent from another planet to war-torn 1970 Jordan.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: An ex-cop sets out on the trail of androids who have mutinied in a bid to extend their limited lifespan and fled back to Earth.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: In 2045 the planet is on the brink of chaos and collapse, but people find salvation in the OASIS: an expansive virtual reality universe created by eccentric James Halliday. When Halliday dies, he promises his immense fortune to the first person to discover a digital Easter egg thats hidden somewhere in the OASIS. When young Wade Watts joins the contest, he finds himself becoming an unlikely hero in a reality-bending treasure hunt through a fantastical world of mystery, discovery and danger.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Gravity

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.desc: An epic adventure about a global cataclysm that brings an end to the world and tells of the heroic struggle of the survivors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Arrival
programme.desc: A linguistics professor leads an elite team of investigators in a race against time to communicate with extraterrestrial visitors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Awakened from their hibernation pods 90 years early, two space travellers enjoy the pleasures of a budding romance until they discover that their ship is in imminent danger.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Gun-toting heroine Alice goes above ground to rid Raccoon City of a second plague of zombies, but the evil Umbrella Corporation and the military have a new secret weapon. With her allies, fellow survivors Jill Valentine, Carlos Oliviera and his Captain, Nicholai, she must battle a new and improved Matt Addison, code name: Nemesis.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Friendships Death
programme.desc: A British reporter meets female robot Friendship, who has been sent from another planet to war-torn 1970 Jordan.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The world is struck by inexplicable phenomena - Romes Colosseum explodes, Londons pigeons go berserk - until it becomes apparent that the planets core has stopped moving, causing electro-magnetic mayhem. The only hope lies in a crack team of scientists burrowing to the core and re-starting earths engine, but is the disaster natural or is there a more sinister explanation?
