The only hope lies in a crack team of scientists burrowing to the core and re-starting earths engine, but is the disaster natural or is there a more sinister explanation?

programme.title: Sick
programme.desc: While quarantining at her familys lake house during the pandemic, Parker and her best friend are threatened by an unexpected visitor.

programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: A couple and their children gather their courage and determination to combat a terrifying threat that may be from an alien force.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.title: Lovely, Dark, and Deep
programme.desc: A new back-country ranger travels alone through the dangerous wilderness, hoping to uncover the origins of a tragedy that has haunted her since she was a child.

programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: In the near future on a decimated Earth, Paul and his twin sons face terror at night when ferocious creatures awaken. When Paul is nearly killed, the boys come up with a plan for survival, using everything their father taught them to keep him alive.

programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: A couple and their children gather their courage and determination to combat a terrifying threat that may be from an alien force.

programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: A family must navigate their lives in silence to avoid mysterious creatures that hunt by sound. Knowing that even the slightest whisper or footstep can bring death, a couple protect their children while desperately searching for a way to fight back.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: A true-crime writer finds a cache of 8mm `snuff films that suggest the murder he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose career dates back to the 1960s.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Its been 40 years since Laurie Strode survived a vicious attack from crazed killer Michael Myers on Halloween night. She now faces a terrifying showdown when the masked madman returns to Haddonfield, Illinois, but this time, Lauries ready for him.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Out of Darkness
programme.desc: A desperate band of early humans finds a new land to settle in some 45,000 years ago. As they start to realise that something monstrous is hunting them down, they must confront a horrifying danger that they never could have imagined.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: A seance scam leads to terror when an evil spirit possesses a widows youngest daughter in 1967 Los Angeles.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: A seance scam leads to terror when an evil spirit possesses a widows youngest daughter in 1967 Los Angeles.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances, then funnel the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: A drought-devastated farmer is desperate for money and, for $200, agrees to guard a notorious outlaw until the train comes to take him to jail. However, the farmer has not reckoned on his prisoners psychological wiles and must resist manipulative strategies aimed at permitting him to escape.

programme.title: The Prosecutor
programme.desc: A poor young man is wrongly charged with drug trafficking after being deceived. An ex-prosecutor investigates the case, uncovers a corrupt lawyer teams scheme, and restores justice despite obstruction from evil forces.

programme.title: Rashomon
programme.desc: A heavy downpour surprises a priest, a woodcutter and a servant. They seek protection from the water in a temple ruin. Previously, they witnessed a crime without knowing how the crime was committed.

programme.title: Gloria
programme.desc: The mob eliminates Jack Dawn and his family. His six year old son, Phil, escapes with Gloria, the girlfriend of one of the gangsters, but they are chased because of a book containing mop accounts.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: While on a Global War on Terror summit in Spain, the president of the United States falls victim to an attempted assassination. Seen from different perspectives, the event is told and re-told by the presidents bodyguards and members of the audience.

programme.title: Murder by Numbers
programme.desc: A troubled female cop must unravel the perfect murder as she matches wits with two homicidal schoolboys, who believe they cant be caught after committing a motiveless crime. As she gets ever closer to the truth she at once alienates her new partner and puts her own life in peril.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances, then funnel the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: Small-time crooks One Two and Mumbles decide to legitimately invest in some prime real estate and find themselves out of their depth and in debt to old-school London gangster Lenny Cole. Cole himself is in the middle of a business deal with a Russian gangster, but when his accountant tips off One Two and Mumbles to the details of an upcoming big-money business transaction, the two scallywags swoop in and steal the cash.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his familys killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: New York City cab driver Travis Bickle constantly reflects on the ugly corruption of life around him, and becomes increasingly disturbed over his own loneliness and alienation. In nearly every phase of his life, Bickle remains a complete outsider, failing to make emotional contact with anyone. Unable to sleep night after night, Travis haunts the local pornography emporiums to find diversion.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: Gloria
programme.desc: The mob eliminates Jack Dawn and his family. His six year old son, Phil, escapes with Gloria, the girlfriend of one of the gangsters, but they are chased because of a book containing mop accounts.

programme.title: Melancholia
programme.desc: A German ex-pat living in London is confronted by his past when hes asked to assassinate a Chilean murderer who is visiting London.

programme.title: The Thicket
programme.desc: When a bounty hunter and a band of unlikely heroes pursue a brutal killer, they find themselves in a deadly no-mans-land known as the Thicket.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances, then funnel the money to members of the audience.

Cole himself is in the middle of a business deal with a Russian gangster, but when his accountant tips off One Two and Mumbles to the details of an upcoming big-money business transaction, the two scallywags swoop in and steal the cash.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of U.S. soldiers.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if hell live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: Thriller adapted from Thomas Harriss first Hannibal Lecter novel about an FBI profiler called out of retirement to help catch a serial killer nicknamed the Tooth Fairy. The agent has the uncanny ability to project himself into the minds of his criminal prey, but the case forces him to confront his past and consult his former nemesis - the now-incarcerated Dr Hannibal Lecter.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: The famous ex-cop known as Shaft sets out to nail Walter Wade Jnr, a killer using his rich-kid connections to escape conviction, but as Shafts net draws tighter, he has to contend with killers employed by a desperate Wade.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Based on a real-life incident. The commander of Russias first nuclear submarine and his executive officers first test voyage ends in disaster when the reactor fails. The only hope is for the crew to repair it at the risk of fatal irradiation, but the two men also have very different political agendas, one of which could trigger global conflict rather than maintain the uneasy truce of the Cold War.

programme.desc: In the Northern Atlantic, cold Canadian waters surround eight European Islands. This is the last remaining overseas territory of France, and the summer-home to a semi-feral population of horses and ponies.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife
programme.desc: When they encounter the last animal of a species, the team must take special care. Other animals to receive Hopes help are a porcupine, a bat and a seal.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild
programme.desc: In India, Ravi the baby lion-tailed macaque faces life in a shrinking habitat and encroaching human world. Luckily he has a caring mum, a protective dad, a playful sister, and numerous, cousins, aunts and uncles all watching over him.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Alison and Jeremy travel to Argentina to meet two chimps as they prepare to bring them back to Dorset. The team attempt to sort out the macaques hierarchy problems.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Alison and Jeremy prepare to fly Sasha and Kangoo from Argentina to Dorset, which means crating and loading them in the middle of the night.

programme.title: Animals Like Us
programme.desc: Marvel at a toothy fish that helps sharks maintain their pearly whites, discover the signature calls of dolphin families, examine a capuchin monkeys nut-cracking stone tools, get the warm fuzzies when giraffes snuggle, and meet a meerkat mobster.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America
programme.desc: Bundle up as Lizzie heads north to tag sharks and witness first-hand the slow, sobering disappearance of sea ice. Do time in bear jail with polar bears who are caught raiding a town for food after their icy hunting grounds diminish.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti

programme.title: Africas Underwater Wonders
programme.desc: Just off the Tanzanian coastline lies an island Utopia. Its diverse habitats provide homes for a multitude of creatures living above the water and below. And when the time is right, a mysterious being rises from the deep to feed in the rich waters. This is Mafia Island.

programme.title: My Best Friends An Animal
programme.desc: Explore a different side of the Tasmanian devil, meet a pioneering sea turtle, enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer, and play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti
programme.desc: Jean Du Plessis takes you on an exhilarating trip through the Serengeti with migrating wildebeest.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: The primate care staff move more than thirty capuchins in a day, the chimps react to a fallen tree and the guenons finally get to try out their revamped home.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Chimp Bryan has a trip to the dentist to remove a rotten molar, and Lee Butler returns to Vietnam to assess repairs needed at Monkey Worlds sister sanctuary.

programme.title: Africas Underwater Wonders
programme.desc: In one of Africas greatest lakes, rock and water set the stage for evolutions most magnificent display. This episode tells the story of this remarkable example of evolution in action, as well as showing how the lake provides for a range of life, both above and below the surface.

programme.title: My Best Friends An Animal
programme.desc: Flap around with Banksi the fruit bat, celebrate a pigs rescue-versary, and learn how to speak baboon with Dingani, who has developed a one-of-a-kind kinship with his primate pal Lucy.

programme.title: Wild Wild East
programme.desc: Cape Breton Highlands National Park was established to protect the primeval forest from clear-cutting, but today the park faces a new threat. Moose, Beavers and Moths have combined to decimate large sections of the Boreal and Acadian woodlands.

programme.title: Wild Wild East
programme.desc: Wild Wild Easts wetland habitats are at risk. These marshes and bogs are the ancient home of the endangered Blandings Turtle, but each fall new turtles spring from the lake shores of Nova Scotia.
